section: The Term of this Agreement shall be for a period of [* ****] years and [*****] months commencing the 1st day of September 2004 and terminating the [*****] day of [*****].
explanation: The term of the contract is not clearly defined. The number of years and months are redacted, as well as the exact termination date. This creates a significant ambiguity because the duration of the agreement is unknown. This could lead to disputes regarding the parties' obligations and rights if the intended term cannot be established by other means or if the redacted information cannot be reliably determined.

section: CONSULTANT shall achieve a satisfactory record of play in a minimum of [* ****] professional golf association events on the SPGA and/or PGA tour (which shall include both the PGA and SPGA Tour Skins Games).
explanation: The minimum number of professional golf association events that the consultant should be playing is not defined as it is redacted. This is an important term as the consultant's performance and how much they get paid, relies on them appearing at such events.

section:
A. In the event of termination of this Agreement, ADAMS GOLF shall cease using the name and/or likeness of CONSULTANT in advertising within [*****] days.
B. In the event of termination of this Agreement, ADAMS GOLF shall cease using the name and/or likeness of CONSULTANT on Product within [*****] months after termination of this Agreement.
explanation: These are two completely different obligations but the text used in the document is identical, meaning that it is not clear when ADAMS GOLF should cease using the name and/or likeness of the consultant, since there are two different timelines that are redacted in the text.
